children.subject:
Let me add that we do read these, discuss them thoroughly and highly value the input. 

The survey may be a bit long but it does help us get a lot of perspective!
Thanks for filling it out!

The timeframe it's asking for is upon entering/beginning to pursue the major, whether that was at the start of your college experience or some time later. Given that you have completed some courses and now know what they expect of you, do you think you were academically ready for the topics and workload that you ended up experiencing?

This question is a bit ambiguous:

Q8.
Were you academically prepared for the EECS/CS major? 

It's not clear at what point you're asking about (when graduating hs? before declaring your major? after completing the major?).

history.content:
[reposting for HKN. This survey is mainly intended for EECS, L&S CS and CS-intended students]

Hi everyone!

Want to have your voice heard by EECS faculty, staff, and the Chairs? The EECS Department welcomes you to fill out the EECS Undergraduate Survey here:
https://berkeley.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_9KSsq7gGNA8Wb53
The EECS Department and HKN have created the 2019-2020 EECS Undergraduate Survey so you can provide input and feedback. This is a great opportunity for you to make a real impact in your classes, student life, and campus culture. Your thoughts will reach faculty and staff and will be used to help improve the department and the community! I know you all have something you want to say about the EE/CS experience, and this is the guaranteed way to get your thoughts read by those who need to hear them.
In addition, once you complete the survey, you can choose to enter a prize drawing to win one of fifteen (15) $10 Amazon gift cards! Just make sure to fill out the form at the end of the survey.
Your response is completely anonymous. We encourage you to respond openly and honestly!
Thank you,
Sean Farhat
history.subject: Feeling Rested? Time for a Survey?
